Name: Squirrel Legacy
About the game: Well this is a standard normal RPGmaker game. An ancient evil has arisen to threaten the world and an equally ancient and ritualized journey must be under taken to save said world. Gathering the power of the legendary Crystals, becoming the Legendary Hero, meeting your fated Hero Companions and defeating the Lich. Hopefully nothing will happen to complicate this simple dance. This game includes: - Turn based combat - Tricky dungeon puzzles - Terrible, terrible choices - Cooking mechanics! - The inevitable extinction of mankind
